name: Goodnight Jemmy
description:
Goodnight Jemmy is a surreal exploration game made in under 5 months solely by one developer (also @ specoryza.tumblr.com).  Meet interesting individuals and view strange visuals, all while attempting to save the Silunata and the lands that connect it.

For Windows computers.

PC will get spooked by the download, but don't worry it is safe.

Run time: Approx. 60 minutes.

Warning: Body horror, gore, blood, existential despair, tense/anxious moments, flashing screen

Note: Don't install it to Program Files or Program Files (x86)

REUPLOADED: Highlighted some legal stuff to keep Jemmy safe with me. (It's a very personal game and it has bits of me in it)

Do you want to see more content and games made by me? Then consider pledging to my Patreon @ https://www.patreon.com/jellyspecs

All original content and game © Jeanine Newsome 2017.                                             https://new-nine-art.tumblr.co...

Paprika belongs to MissusRuin @ http://missusruin.tumblr.com/

TacoSalad Cast belongs to Valentine @ https://twitter.com/ReimuPK
